name: Defira (Cronos)
description: Defira is a blockchain metaverseâ€”the Defiraverse. It is a fusion of DeFi and GameFi, harnessing the synergies of both models to create engaging gameplay experiences that fully take advantage of the unique strengths of the blockchain medium. We aim to cultivate the Defiraverse as a multimedia franchise and valuable piece of intellectual property, which is owned and driven by a decentralized community and fandom.
